participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: adventurous and spirited, always seeking the thrill of the open road.
participant_1.background: my main transportation is my motorbike. i've light skin with big brown eyes. i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Dr. Samuel
participant_2.personality: caring and driven, devoted to his family and passionate about his career.
participant_2.background: i am a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.
